## Description {#details}

Implementation of <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/format-provider">format&#95;provider&lt;T&gt;</a> for characters.

The options string of a character type has the grammar:

char&#95;options :: (empty) | &#91;integer&#95;options&#93;

If <code>char&#95;options</code> is empty, the character is displayed as an ASCII character. Otherwise, it is treated as an integer options string.

Definition at line 236 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/formatproviders-h">FormatProviders.h</a>.
